subject: Initial import of IVI demo videos.

comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

The tag submit/trunk/20121022.202542 pushed, but the commit 67b033408113079b8b06a566000508d10986bab0 is still under review in gerrit. After reviewer accpet this commit, it will be submitted to OBS corresponding project.

Patch Set 1:

rpmlint checked packaging/sample-media.spec: 0 errors, 0 warnings.

Patch Set 1: Verified; Looks good to me, but someone else must approve

Submitting the IVI demo videos minus the 1080p version of Sintel. I don't have it.

Patch Set 1: Verified; Looks good to me, approved

Will you also update the start_video.sh script to point at the new location?
